phrases: I just hope he will get used to the stables.
That is good, because one wild horse is enough to handle.
Excuse me, but can you please not butt in?
You did the same thing during our audition.
But it was fun, was not it?
If anything, you should be thanking us.
Though, we are missing a member.
We even have a hit song.
But I guess you youngins have not heard of the Condor Queens.
We were even on a commercial once.
And now a tune to make men merry.
These days, we are mostly touring the country playing some modest live shows.
I would say music is not so much a job anymore,
This is your grandpappy's theme song!
I have been your fan since I was a kid!
Would you play at the World Music Festival?
Would not they be just perfect?
So does that mean you withdraw your audition?
Are you okay with that, Konatsu?
That would be great, if you would take us...
We try to not be picky about our venues.
We did not do a thing.
Why do not you put them up at your place until the event?
You want me to do what?
It is not like you are short on rooms.
we have got no business staying at a temple.
Unless your temple has a nice, big parking lot?
You could have just told me from
the start that you knew my mother.
I just could not contain myself!
What are you doing down there?
They are going to Okita's house with some band, instead.
It is been a long time since we could kick back like this.
If you ask me, Japan's too cramped.
Please let me know if you need anything.
Thank you, you are too kind.
Thank you, but I am fine.
I want to have enough time to talk to them.
Then why do not you sleep in their camper?
We met Mahiru back when we were on tour.
Saying we wrote that song is not quite right;
it is more like it was born.
Well, we considered her a dear friend and benefactor...
You might even say we were in love with her.
But we are not your daddy!
No dirty jokes around the girl!
You look a lot like she did back then.
And her hair was a touch longer.
I still cannot believe that Mahiru's gone.
I do not want my Poem gettin' spooked.
Watch out, Poem, he will eat you.
I wanted to talk to you about today's practice.
You do not have to work,
so we are having it at school, right?
Yeah, but I was wondering if it is okay if I skip it.
The guys said they are going to do
a test run at the beach house stage.
I figured it might be good to watch the pros at work.
Why do not we all skip, and check it out?
We have not made any progress!
Is this a game to you?
No matter who I am riding with, or how much I respect them,
when we ride together, I want to be the best!
then I am quitting the choir club!
No, I do not think so...
All right, let us get started!
A pro should never be late.
Would you like us to give you our slot on stage?
You can keep on singing long after graduation,
but it will not be the same.
You have got a song you can only sing
with the people and feelings you have got now.
You think graduation's a big deal?
We are about to graduate from life!
We are not old enough to give up the things we love.
You need to go back to your own stage, amigo.
I did not come for her.
I want to ask you a question.
Is there a stage left that we could sing on?!
Without her, all we can do are sit-ups.
I am sure she is on her way.
And she used to be in the music school?
You know, I have never actually heard her sing.
She is taking a supplementary class.
Should I invite her next time?
There is one place that has not found a performer yet.
I do not know if they will use you, but it is worth a shot.
Have you chosen a performer for the World Music Festival?
She said she knew someone who might be
I think she might still be around.
I am just glad you found a stage.
I have not ran that hard in ages.
So, have you found an answer?
If only I was a virtuoso...
I bet by now I would...
When you said you quit music, did you mean...
Miyamoto-san, do you know anything about this song?
I am not all that familiar with it.
I want you guys to listen to the CD and practice your parts.
We need to maximize our time.
I do not want a consolation prize,
so let us win the popularity vote and sing on the main stage!
The waves break on the shore.
The beach is far from us, so nobody's come.
At least there is the consolation prize.
Everyone is really into their show.
This is the song that your mom helped compose, right?
Should not you be on stage?
You do not wait for an audience to sing!
You sing to make the audience come!
Want us to go out with you for an encore?
That stage is ours, even if it is a small one.
We have to do this on our own.
Let us go back to our stage!
I heard that you gave up music.
I want to write songs that always fit.
At the time, we did not understand what she meant,
and laughed it off as some crazy dream...
But maybe she was talking about you.
It is not something you do or do not do.
That is what your mother told us, long ago.
That is a letter we got from your mother when you were born.
I would like you to have it.
That kid is so not cute.
The waves break on the shore.
In the distance, I see a white beach.
Can I have your picture, too?
Nothin's going to steal my soul.
I got cake for you, too.
Giving up is not an option!
Episode 5 Throwing Away and Holding On
I have been thinking about getting rid of the piano in my room.
